name: Breakfast by the Water
short_description: Book this offer to start each day of your stay with a full breakfast and spectacular ocean views!
description:
Book this offer and enjoy:

  • Tropically inspired elegant accommodations
  • Daily breakfast at Yellowfin Bar & Grill for each adult on the reservation
  • Shuttle service to Key West Historic Seaport (downtown)
  • 2-hour paddleboard, kayak, or bicycle rental
  • Personalized in-room entertainment via 49-inch Smart TV
  • Access to Digital Concierge services
  • Access to complimentary resort activities, 24-hour gym, and lawn games
  • Access to 6 heated pristine pools with poolside refreshment service
  • Access to a deep-water full marina with a variety of water activities

image.name: breakfast
image.alt: Breakfast included - offer from Oceans Edge Resort and Marina

terms_conditions: Breakfast vouchers will be provided based on number of adults listed on reservation. Daily rates are subject to taxes, fees, and nightly resort fee of $37 plus tax. On-site parking is available for $20 per night plus tax per vehicle and parking space required. Restrictions and blackout dates may apply.
short_description_detail_page: Start each day island-style with ocean views and an excellent breakfast of 2 farm-fresh eggs, home-fried potatoes, toast, bacon or sausage, and your choice of juice or coffee! If youâ€™re planning to paddleboard or kayak in the late morning, this is the perfect start.
